description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items include: curling, the Stadel Art Institute in Frankfurt, job equality for women, CARE- a German humanitarian organisation, laser disks from Hannover, the city of Cologne, world show-jumping champion - Norbert Koof.
